resources.string: Tips: Click the top left button to turn on Night Screen.
No permission is needed, but it cannot dim the lockscreen, status bar, or navigation bar (and it doesn\'t work in Android 7.0)
Recommended mode. It is stable, although it cannot dim navigation bar, or prevent the user from clicking \"Install\" or \"Allow\" in permission dialog.
You can dim both the status bar and navigation bar. However, it may cause screen flashing in some apps.
Since Android Oreo (8.0), the system strictly limits the permission of floating window. Old methods were no longer available. Maybe we will support better methods to control brightness in the future.
Author: Paper Airplane Dev - Fung Gwo
